Aphid: Spray Neem oil extract (3%). Introduce natural predators like ladybugs. Avoid excess nitrogen fertilizer.
Stem Borer: Use light traps at night; apply authorised insecticide during vulnerable stages; maintain field sanitation.
Whitefly: Use yellow sticky traps, apply neem oil spray, and remove weed hosts nearby.
Thrips: Spray Neem extract or Spinosad 45% SC according to label. Use blue sticky traps for monitoring.
Armyworm: Apply Bacillus thuringiensis (Bt) or use light traps. Monitor and remove egg masses.
Pod Borer: Use pheromone traps, release natural enemies, or apply recommended biological insecticides.
